pages.title: Overview
pages.text: Enchanting benefits Upgrades ONLY, All enchants have a Focused Book which makes obtaining them easier. $(br)Here are some of the possible enchants: $(li)$(l:pedestals:getting_started_enchants/enchant_advanced)Advanced $()$(li)$(l:pedestals:getting_started_enchants/enchant_area)Area $()$(li)$(l:pedestals:getting_started_enchants/enchant_capacity)Capacity $()$(li)$(l:pedestals:getting_started_enchants/enchant_magnet)Magnet $()$(li)$(l:pedestals:getting_started_enchants/enchant_range)Range $()$(li)$(l:pedestals:getting_started_enchants/enchant_speed)Speed $()
